text: Samwel Mwera (born 3 June 1985) is a Tanzanian middle distance runner who specializes in the 800 and 1500 metres. He was born in Musoma. ==Competition record== {| |- !colspan="6"|Representing |- |2001 |World Youth Championships |Debrecen, Hungary |5th |1500 m |3:44.85 |- |2002 |World Junior Championships |Kingston, Jamaica |bgcolor=cc9966| 3rd |1500 m |3:41.75 |- |rowspan=3|2003 |rowspan=2|All-Africa Games |rowspan=2|Abuja, Nigeria |bgcolor=gold| 1st |800 m |1:46.13 |- |6th |1500 m |3:45.76 |- |Afro-Asian Games |Hyderabad, India |bgcolor=cc9966|3rd |800 m |1:47.98 |- |rowspan=2|2004 |World Indoor Championships |Budapest, Hungary | – |800 m |DQ |- |Olympic Games |Athens, Greece |4th (h) |800 m |1:45.30 |- |2005 |World Championships |Helsinki, Finland | – |800 m |DQ |- |2006 |Commonwealth Games |Melbourne, Australia | – |800 m |DQ |- |2007 |World Championships |Osaka, Japan |25th (h) |800 m |1:46.24 |- |2008 |Olympic Games |Beijing, China |54th (h) |800 m |1:50.67 |} ===Personal bests=== *800 metres - 1:45.28 min (2005) *1500 metres - 3:35.42 min (2004) *5000 metres - 13:29.14 min (2005) ==External links== * Category:1985 births Category:Living people Category:People from Musoma Category:Tanzanian male middle-distance runners Category:Olympic athletes of Tanzania Category:Athletes (track and field) at the 2004 Summer Olympics Category:Athletes (track and field) at the 2008 Summer Olympics Category:Athletes (track and field) at the 2006 Commonwealth Games Category:Commonwealth Games competitors for Tanzania Category:African Games gold medalists for Tanzania Category:African Games medalists in athletics (track and field) Category:Athletes (track and field) at the 2003 All-Africa Games
title: Samwel Mwera
